attributes.action: Ban non recyclable plastics from packaging/single use products/sale in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: To be honest, if you don't get it you should not be representing us.
attributes.background: Ban the plastics that can't be recycled and invest in the waste centre's facilities throughout the UK. Tax the plastics that can't be recycled to pay for the waste centres, with the goal of zero plastic use that can't be recycled.
